SSYLabelledPopUp Class Reference

This class provides a control which consists of a non-editable NSTextField label and, below it, a popup button. More...

Detailed Description

This class provides a control which consists of a non-editable NSTextField label and, below it, a popup button.

May be used, for example for a user to select Favorite Color, Gender, etc. etc.

Member Function Documentation

+ (SSYLabelledPopUp *) popUpControlWithLabel: (NSString*)  label  

Convenience method for getting an autoreleased instance of this class.

Parameters:
label The text value of the label which will appear above the popup button in the returned instance.
Returns:
The instance, autoreleased

- (void) setChoices: (NSArray*)  choices  

Sets the array of choices to appear in the receiver's popup button.

Parameters:
choices An array of strings

- (void) sizeHeightToFitAllowShrinking: (BOOL)  allowShrinking  

Resizes the height of the receiver to accomodate the its current values, subject to allowsShrinking.

Parameters:
allowShrinking YES if the height is allowed to be reduced. If this parameter is NO, and less height than the current height is required, this invocation will not reduce the height but will instead leave empty space.
